When an input with "required" attribute and style="display: none;" is validated, the validation tooltip is smushed up into the window title bar.

Steps to reproduce:
See jsfiddle url

Actual result:
The tooltip for textarea#content validation is rendered in the window title bar

Expected result:
Render the tooltip in the document window or anywhere the full message can be seen. Maybe a special message for this oddball case of required & display: none?
